attributes.action: Prosecute all Councils that have failed to comply with the Regulatory Reform Fire Safety Order 2005, councils are compelled to conduct fire risk assessments before and during major refurbishments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the Regulatory Reform Fire Safety Order 2005, councils are compelled to conduct fire risk assessments before and during major refurbishments.

We ask that the Prime Minister prosecute all councils across the UK who systematically failed to comply with the law.

Peoples lives are at risk as well as their homes.  How many more people need to die before Councils are held to account?
